snippet: A Cuban singer and music producer has filed a plagiarism lawsuit against pop stars Shakira and Carlos Vives for allegedly copying his work in the Colombian duo's award-winning music hit "La Bicicleta ."...

headline.main: WH Defends Pence's Use of Private Email While Governor
headline.print_headline: WH Defends Pence's Use of Private Email While Governor

lead_paragraph: A Cuban singer and music producer has filed a plagiarism lawsuit against pop stars Shakira and Carlos Vives for allegedly copying his work in the Colombian duo's award-winning music hit "La Bicicleta ."
